00001 #include "Animation.h"

00010 #include "../tinyxml/tinyxml.h"
00011 
00012 using namespace std;
00013 
00014 namespace jvgs
00015 {
00016     namespace game
00017     {
00018         struct AnimationFrame
00019         {
00020             Sketch *sketch;
00021             float duration;
00022         };
00023 
00024         void Animation::loadData(TiXmlElement *element)
00025         {
00026             if(element->Attribute("id"))
00027                 id = element->Attribute("id");
00028             else
00029                 LogManager::getInstance()->error("Animations must have an id.");
00030 
00031             /* Loop through all frame elements, adding them. */
00032             TiXmlElement *child = element->FirstChildElement("frame");
00033             while(child) {
00034                 string fileName = child->Attribute("sketch");
00035                 float duration;
00036                 child->QueryFloatAttribute("duration", &duration);
00037                 addFrame(fileName, duration);
00038                 child = child->NextSiblingElement("frame");
00039             }
00040         }
00041 
00042         Animation::Animation(const string &id)
00043         {
00044             this->id = id;
00045             currentFrame = 0;
00046             counter = 0;
00047         }
00048 
00049         Animation::Animation(TiXmlElement *element)
00050         {
00051             load(element);
00052             currentFrame = 0;
00053             counter = 0;
00054         }
00055 
00056         Animation::~Animation()
00057         {
00058             /* Clear AnimationFrames. */
00059             for(vector<AnimationFrame*>::iterator iterator = frames.begin();
00060                     iterator != frames.end(); iterator++)
00061                 delete (*iterator);
00062         }
00063 
00064         const string &Animation::getId() const
00065         {
00066             return id;
00067         }
00068 
00069         void Animation::addFrame(const string &fileName, float duration)
00070         {
00071             SketchManager *sketchManager = SketchManager::getInstance();
00072             AnimationFrame *frame = new AnimationFrame;
00073             frame->sketch = sketchManager->getSketch(fileName);
00074             frame->duration = duration;
00075             frames.push_back(frame);
00076         }
00077 
00078         void Animation::update(float ms)
00079         {
00080             if(frames.size() > 0) {
00081                 counter += ms;
00082                 while(counter >= frames[currentFrame]->duration) {
00083                     counter -= frames[currentFrame]->duration;
00084                     currentFrame = (currentFrame + 1) % frames.size();
00085                 }
00086             }
00087         }
00088 
00089         void Animation::render()
00090         {
00091             if(frames.size() > 0)
00092                 frames[currentFrame]->sketch->render();
00093         }
00094     }
00095 }
